title: Dish Drying Mats Christmas Snowflake 18x24" Kitchen Dry Mat，Absorbent Quick Drying Dish Mat Machine Washable 2100018
features: ULTRA ABSORBENT: Absorbent polyester material, soft cushioned drying surface to protect dishes, glassware, serveware, flatware and your counter tops. Reversible for convenience and optimal performance.

QUICK DRY: The surface is made of water-absorbent polyester material, and the middle is composite sponge material, which can absorb water quickly. As a protective pad to protect the countertop and tableware, keep your kitchen countertops dry and clean.
MULTIPLE USES: The dish drying mat is soft and durable, also can be used as dish mat, cup mat, heat resistant mat.
EASY TO STORE: With hanging loop, can be hung on the kitchen wall. Soft and foldable, easy to store in any drawer, cabinet, or closet.
WASH CARE: Hand wash or machine wash, dry in shade. Please use mild neutral detergent for detergent.
description: Material: Polyester (printed side) + Ultra absorbent Sponge + Cotton satin
Size: 18x24inch. Meet the needs of different areas of the kitchen.

The surface is made of water-absorbent polyester material, and the middle is composite sponge material, which can absorb water quickly. As a protective pad to protect the countertop and tableware, keep your kitchen countertops dry and clean.
Heat-resistant, this drying dish mat can also be used as a countertop heat insulation pad.
Both sides are crafted with durable microfiber, so you'll have two surfaces to use for drying.
With hanging loop, can be hung on the kitchen wall. Soft and foldable, easy to store in any drawer, cabinet, or closet.
Hand wash or machine wash, dry in shade. Please use mild neutral detergent for detergent.
